title: Pay
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

**A+ Rewards**

- [My e-voucher code from A+ Rewards is not working. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/41424154394393-My-e-voucher-code-from-A-Rewards-is-not-working-What-do-I-do)
- [How do I buy or claim A+ Rewards Vouchers in GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4404397487257-How-do-I-buy-or-claim-A-Rewards-Vouchers-in-GCash)

**Scan to Pay via QR**

- [How do I use Scan to Order on GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36066111052441-How-do-I-use-Scan-to-Order-on-GCash)
- [How can I use Scan to Pay via QR Code?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017563034-How-can-I-use-Scan-to-Pay-via-QR-Code)
- [Can GCash QR Payments be used in other countries?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/7540023800601-Can-GCash-QR-Payments-be-used-in-other-countries)
- [I can’t scan the QR code. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31315639906073-I-can-t-scan-the-QR-code-What-do-I-do)
- [I was charged multiple times after using Scan to Pay QR. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31315974255129-I-was-charged-multiple-times-after-using-Scan-to-Pay-QR-What-do-I-do)
- [Merchant didn't receive the payment and/or SMS when I used Scan to Pay. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31316001083289-Merchant-didn-t-receive-the-payment-and-or-SMS-when-I-used-Scan-to-Pay-What-do-I-do)

**Pay Online**

- [I want a refund for my online payment or subscription using my GCash account. Where can I get it?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45496741233817-I-want-a-refund-for-my-online-payment-or-subscription-using-my-GCash-account-Where-can-I-get-it)
- [I was charged more than once for my online payment or subscription in my GCash account. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45492536288409-I-was-charged-more-than-once-for-my-online-payment-or-subscription-in-my-GCash-account-What-should-I-do)
- [I entered incorrect details in my GCash online payment or subscription. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45484817449497-I-entered-incorrect-details-in-my-GCash-online-payment-or-subscription-What-should-I-do)
- [How can I pay online using GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900006144666-How-can-I-pay-online-using-GCash)
- [I have a problem with my order or service from my online subscription or GCash payment. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31317973344153-I-have-a-problem-with-my-order-or-service-from-my-online-subscription-or-GCash-payment-What-should-I-do)
- [How do I unlink and link GCash to Grab as my payment method?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/44415107846169-How-do-I-unlink-and-link-GCash-to-Grab-as-my-payment-method)
[See all 11 articles](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004658014-Pay-Online)

**Tap N' Pay**

- [How do I use and activate Tap N' Pay?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/34932356672537-How-do-I-use-and-activate-Tap-N-Pay)
- [I can’t pay using GCash Tap N' Pay. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/29803032229529-I-can-t-pay-using-GCash-Tap-N-Pay-What-should-I-do)
- [I used Tap N' Pay but the merchant didn’t receive the payment and/or SMS confirmation. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39131881310489-I-used-Tap-N-Pay-but-the-merchant-didn-t-receive-the-payment-and-or-SMS-confirmation-What-should-I-do)
- [I was charged more than once when I used Tap N' Pay. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40300421330073-I-was-charged-more-than-once-when-I-used-Tap-N-Pay-What-do-I-do)

**Watch Pay**

- [GCash Watch Pay](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/39714168606105-GCash-Watch-Pay)

- [I can’t pay using GCash Watch Pay. What should I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40477864099865-I-can-t-pay-using-GCash-Watch-Pay-What-should-I-do)
